## gctx switch

Switch to a different account

```
gctx switch [account-name] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Switch to 'my-account'
  gctx switch my-account

  # Switch interactively (fuzzy search)
  gctx switch
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for switch
```
